text: Yamila Diaz-Rahi (born 9 March 1976) is an Argentine model.Today Yamila Diaz Rahi is a popular ceramic artist in Brooklyn New York. Yamila Diaz Rahi Ceramics. == Background == DÃ­az was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina to a Lebanese father and Spanish mother. Her father was a doctor and her mother was a health care manager. While studying Economics in Buenos Aires in 1996 she was discovered by a scout from Milan. == Career == After working in Milan for a few years, she was featured in the 1999 Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue, and was on the cover of the magazine in 2002 and 2006. Diaz-Rahi has also been on other magazines such as GQ, Maxim, and so on. She has also appeared in the Victoria's Secret catalog, and various advertisements. == References == == Other websites == * Yamila Diaz-Rahi on IMDb * Yamila Diaz-Rahi on the Fashion Model Directory Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine models Category:People from Buenos Aires
title: Yamila Diaz-Rahi
